title: Gravelord Azir attackmove with soldier bug
body:
When Azir's soldiers are up, attack move makes him move to a seemingly random place on the map.I have only tried this with the Gravelord Azir skin so it may occur with the vanilla.

Summon soldiers, attack move in between attack animations, and a random place is chosen. Happens about 8/10 times.

replies.body:
Hey ChiefOfBeef521! 

Thanks for the report! This a champion issue we're aware of and are working to resolve. ^-^
